title: getting same error when i try to install game...
body:
It keeps saying there is a problem with a file would you like to retry...but it just keeps reapeating

replies.body: Be sure you've installed all the available Windows Updates and the [C++ 2005 Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) **before** trying another install. If you still get error when installing League after taking those steps, [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and post it in a reply.
